snippet: World number ones Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams will feel like they are working overtime on Friday when organizers cram all four semi-finals into a single session to try and ensure a rain-ravaged tournament ends on schedule....
lead_paragraph: World number ones Novak Djokovic and Serena Williams will feel like they are working overtime on Friday when organizers cram all four semi-finals into a single session to try and ensure a rain-ravaged tournament ends on schedule.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Serena Face Overtime as Paris Finals Beckon
headline.main: Djokovic, Serena Face Overtime as Paris Finals Beckon
